 2012-10002012-07-06,  ,  CIC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to provide for greater transparency and consistency in the application of the government's stated objective of fast-tracking removals following a negative refugee decision.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0154 Publication Date: 2012-08-15
AttachmentsAttachment
